message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair split.
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more reasonable. It reflects my increased risk of losing value with each round.  Let's end this fairly.
Considering the inflation is taking its toll on your share, I'll take a bit more. It's still a generous offer, if I do say so myself.
Let's be fair. Inflation is hitting me hard, so I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  I'm willing to offer you the same deal I rejected last round.
I'm willing to make a deal, Bob, but I need to consider the significant impact of inflation on your share. This is my most generous offer yet, given the circumstances.
